summary: Most core UI requirements appear implemented: single-page structure with 5 sections, wine/cream alternating Section wrapper with pattern overlay classes, romantic typography, in-view fade animations, editable love letter with copy, editable memories with add/edit/copy and clipboard image paste, and a reasons grid with icons. However, the diff does not provide clear evidence that the required generated image assets exist/are used for both cream and wine pattern overlays, and it adds several unrequested features (Internet Identity/react-query actor plumbing, lucide-react icon dependency usage, and a marketing footer attribution).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the UI for subtle background pattern overlays and romantic decorative accents (without routing images through the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows a reference to the gold icon set image in ReasonsSection, but does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the pattern overlay classes (pattern-cream/pattern-wine) are not shown referencing the required pattern PNGs. Since some added files were omitted/truncated, existence/usage of both required pattern images cannot be confirmed from the provided evidence.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (truncated; pattern class definitions not visible)
File diff summary notes: "Omitted files due to limits: added=4"
